DescriptionData.Title: 1000m Gutermann Sew-all Thread 36
DescriptionData.Description:
Buy 3 Gutterman Sew-all threads of the same size (any colour) and save 5%!

Buy 10 Gutterman Sew-all threads of the same size  (any colour) and save 10%!

Discount applied in your basket


Gutermann Sew-all thread is the most reliable of machine threads. It may be used on natural, blended and synthetic fabrics which makes it extremely versatile.

DescriptionData.Title: ODIF 505 Temporary Adhesive Spray 250ml
DescriptionData.Description:
ODIF 505 Temporary Adhesive Spray 250ml
Temprary fabric adhesive. Odorless Colourless Stainless Spotless Does not gum needles No CFC
Please note that special postage prices may apply within certain postcode areas of the UK. We are also unable to send this product outside of the UK due to carrier restricitons on aerosols.
If your postcode is in either of the two lists below then you will need to select the appropriate additional postage charge:
Zone C AB 31 to AB 38 AB 40 to AB 56 IV 1 to 28 IV 30 to 32 IV 36 & 40 IV 52 to 54 IV63 KW 1 to 14 PA 21 to PA 38 PH 4 to PH 41 PH 49, PH 50 Northern Ireland (BT)
Zone D HS IV 41 to 49 IV 51, 55 & 56 KA 27 & 28 KW 15 to17 PA 20 PA 41 to 49 PA 60 to 78 PH 42 to 44 ZE Isle of Man (IM) Channel Islands

DescriptionData.Title: Clover Leather Coin Thimble - Medium
DescriptionData.Description: A medium leather coin thimble, made form soft yellow leather, very comfortable to wear and with a metal guard to protect your finger during use.
